data.name: Warbox Sandbox
data.detailed_description:
Warbox Sandbox allows players to simulate battles between different factions from different eras - real and fictional. Participate in the battle directly as lone wolf or with a faction of your choice or watch the carnage unfold with the blood and gore settings turned to the max.

While the game is in a completely feature complete and playable state don't expect it to stay the same - this is a growing and evolving game with an active community. New features, updates, and changes will always be around the corner!

  • Active Ragdolls
  • Gore and Dismemberment
  • Custom Teams
  • Tons of characters
  • World War 2, Police, Gangs, Zombie, Knights, etc.
  • Low poly graphics
  • Lots of options

Raving reviews by mobile players - imagine how much fun it'll be on your powerful PC!

data.short_description: The ultimate war sandbox. Participate or simply watch as the gore-y carnage unfolds. Factions. Weapons. Gore. Robbers. Zombies. Knights. Need I say more? Constant new features and updates!
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Ukrainian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3-4130 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 460 / HD 6850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 / RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13
  • Processor: Intel i3-4130 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 460 / HD 6850
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 / RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: Intel i3-4130 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 460 / HD 6850
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 / RX 580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Contains, toggle-able, copious amounts of blood, gore, and dismemberment.
